title: Nexxus Sleek Memory Straightening Smoothing Spray -- 7.5 oz.
description: Tame Your FrizzTame your strands with Nexxus Sleek Memory Straightening Smoothing Spray. This smoothing spray works well with your heat appliances to teach hair to remember your straight, sleek style each time you straighten it, so that your straightening routine becomes faster and easier. Use this straightening spray to obtain smooth, straight frizz-free hair.Works well with heat styling toolsHelps tame your frizzLeaves hair straight and smoothThis scientific formula works well on unmanageable hair and leaves your hair smooth and soft.Just For You:All hair typesA Closer Look:Nexxus Sleek Memory Straightening Smoothing Spray contains water, glycerin, PVP, silk amino acids, linalool, panthenol, wheat flour, avocado oil and soybean sterols together with other ingredients. The silk amino acids strengthen and repair hair strands and also impart moisture to your hair.Get Started:Spray a small amount onto damp, towel-dried hair. Comb through to distribute evenly. Do not rinse. Proceed with regular straightening.

title: Yes To Carrots Makeup Removing Cleanser, 8.45 Fluid Ounce
description: Don’t you love that feeling at the end of the day when you can take off your makeup and finally put your feet up? Yes to carrots makeup removing cleanser will have you on your couch in no time. This exceptional blend of organic carrot juice, minerals and dead sea mud removes all traces of both eye and face makeup to refresh, stimulate and revitalize your skin.

title: John Frieda Frizz Ease 3-Day Straight Styling Spray, 3.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Frizz ease 3-day straight semi-permanent styling spray 3.5 fluid ounce creates visibly straighter hair for up to 3 days.
